sense.def:
To invite someone to a party or a meal
pomeni nekoga prositi, naj pride na zabavo ali obed.

seg.quote: Leggett invited me for lunch at the hotel.

sense.def:
Kdor je
invited to do something
, je uradno naprošen, naj nekaj stori.

seg.quote: I was invited to attend future meetings.

sense.def:
To invite something
pomeni povzročiti, da se ljudje do nas vedejo na določen način, na primer z zaupanjem ali nejevero;

seg.quote: This kind of statement invites disbelief.

sense.def:
To invite danger or trouble
pomeni narediti nevarnost ali težave verjetnejše;

seg.quote: To speak of it to others would invite danger.
